ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Exp & Seb question -- was Re: AC
ygData.msgSnippet: I have been experiencing quite a bit of hate list wierdness in Kunark. Were you guys charming anything?  We noticed in Frontier that if our enchanter charmed
ygData.messageBody:
I have been experiencing quite a bit of 'hate list' wierdness in Kunark.
Were you guys charming anything? We noticed in Frontier that if our
enchanter charmed a giant, he got added to the hate list of several if not
all the giants in the castle. When my song pulsed on him, even from halfway
across the zone, if I went within chase range the giants in the castle would
agro on me even though I had never been anywhere near them before.

Definitely sounds like a bug to me and we got a gm to come witness it and
make a report.

Kitasi

-----Original Message-----
From: jhenders@... [mailto:jhenders@...]
Sent: Thursday, May 25, 2000 10:14 AM
To: eqbards@egroups.com
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Exp & Seb question -- was Re: AC


On Thu, May 25/00, Sylly Songsynger <jgs@...> wrote:

>... Anyone know? Anyone been to the lower
> levels in Seb?
>

Forgot to answer this. Our guild has been down to right outside Trak's
lair. Those shrooms guard the caves down there, along with Sebilite
Protectors and some very high level frogs. There's no way in hell they
should be agroing up by the bridge area.

SPOILER BELOW.

































if you jump off the first bridge you hit on the way in and swim down to
the end of the right side water area, you can swim down a tunnel that
takes you to a jail filled with high level frogs. There's a passage down
there that will take you into the cave area and on to Trak's lair. I
wouldn't advise trying this without a high level multi group party, and
we haven't done it since the patch so it may be even harder with the
random mob warping we are seeing now.
